meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
readingMnemonic: You are <vocabulary>naked</vocabulary> now. You used to wear a car, but you don't have it anymore (and you're not wearing it). You <reading>had a ca</reading>r (はだか), but now you don't have a car. That's what you'll explain when someone asks you why you're naked.
